name: Untold Atlas
description:
Discover a captivating world of adventure and romance! Immerse yourself in a thrilling otome game where your choices shape the story and determine your fate with your loved one. Join thousands of players who have already started their adventure from the mobile app and download the PC Version of "Untold Atlas" today to experience this adventure game!

◆ Engage in epic adventures: Explore ancient ruins, uncover hidden secrets, and encounter mysterious characters as you first live your slice of life "expedition version" on the island of Aethra, before discovering there's more than meets the eye behind-the-scenes.

◆ Choose your love interest: Fom a cast of charming characters, each with their own unique personality and storyline. Will you find true love on your journey?

◆Make choices that matter: Every decision you make influences the course of your story, leading to multiple endings and unexpected twists. Your journey is in your hands!

◆Stunning artwork: Fall in love with the gorgeous art style that brings the world of Untold Atlas to life.

■ Game Experience

“Untold Atlas” is a choice-driven, expedition simulation where you can bond and interact with fellow coworkers and three romance-able characters to unlock group chats and romantic scenarios in the story! Choose daily actions to experience encounters and branching routes based on your answer choices and relationships with three love interests (GxB or GxG).

■ Features

-Choose how to spend your days exploring the map of Aethra
-Unlockable in-game group chat content with characters
-Unlockable CGs
-Unlockable achievements
-Accomplish expedition missions
-Text adventure mini-game
-Customizable MC name
-10+ different endings
